Name: VR Slots 3D
About the game: Welcome Try for free the first VR Slots in the world. Two incredible gaming machines in one application. Start playing now and get free coins every day. Dracula’s Family Dracula is back, so hold the breath and experience New Video Slot Game - Dracula’s family. This is a 5 reel, 3 row, 15 line video slot featuring Wild Symbol, Scatter Symbol, Risk Game and four different free spin modes. In Dracula’s Family you can play 1, 3, 5, 9, 13 and 15 bet lines with different coin values. Art of the Heist Theft is an art, which one should learn for years. But you have a great opportunity to learn from the greatest Thief of all times – Vincenzo! Enjoy 5x3, 21-line video slot, which will show you how to rob the museum, where the world masterpieces are hidden. Let Vincenzo complete the Robber’s Pathway to trigger Free Spins. There are special symbols: some of them help you on your way, and some are obstacles. Mona Lisa picture symbol triggers the Bonus Game, where you have to explore rooms and find the alarm control. Wild symbol will not only substitutes all symbols, but if appearing in the same cell with Vincenzo, grants additional Free Spins. And you can see your collection of masterpieces and total winnings in the Award Room. Functionality and control You can run the game using a virtual reality helmet or without it. While playing a virtual track, you can use controllers, or use a keyboard or mouse instead. Control in normal mode - You can rotate the camera by holding the left mouse button; - You can hover the mouse over the button of the panel and click the game control buttons. VR mode control - You can control the player with the help of controllers; - If you do not have controllers, you can control the game using a helmet to point at objects and left mouse click to interact with them.

Meta Description: Looking for information on VR Slots 3D? Check out the release date (Aug 30, 2018), developer insights from Belka VR, and a complete game summary.
